# calendar

**Instance Property**

The calendar that the calendar view illustrates.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var calendar: Calendar { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendar/current], which is the user’s current calendar set in Settings.

## Setting calendar details

- **locale**: The locale the calendar view uses for calendar conventions.
- **timeZone**: The time zone from the date the calendar view displays.
